lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority is considering two plans that would increase fares and tolls across the system by about 4 percent on average, part of a 2009 financial rescue deal.

headline.print_headline: Subway Ride Could Cost $3 in Plan to Raise Tolls and Fares
headline.main: Subway Ride Could Cost $3 Under M.T.A. Plan for Fare and Toll Increases

snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority is considering two plans that would increase fares and tolls across the system by about 4 percent on average, part of a 2009 financial rescue deal....
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority is considering two proposals for 2017 fare and toll increases, one of which would raise subway fare to $3; plans to hike fares every two years in order to cover rising costs, frustrating riders who feel delays and overcrowding are becoming worse.
